name: Thighkwondo
description:
Battle against other ladies to conquer the title of THICC THIGHS!!!

How to Play and Theme Relevance:
Kick your enemy out of the Mat to win the Game!, The theme is applied in how you can defeat the enemy, by not stopping the combo and having a perfect blocks and attacks to effectively defeat the opponent.
What's more juicer than a pair of Thicc Thighs.

CONTROLS:
(Combine Movements and Attack or Block)
Player1 - WASD for Movements - C for Attack or Enter - V for Block
Player2 - Arrows for Movements - K for Attack or Enter - L for Block
Also Controller Supported!!!


Credits:
Menu Music - Peractorum from Youtube
Game Music - Ooame
